column1: Distributed Community Detection via Metastability of the 2-Choices Dynamics

column2: Emanuele Natale@Max Planck Institute for Informatics

column1: We investigate the behavior of a simple majority dynamics on networks of agents whose interaction topology exhibits a community structure. By leveraging recent advancements in the analysis of dynamics
column3: when the states of the nodes are randomly initialized
column4: the system rapidly and stably converges to a configuration in which the communities maintain internal consensus on different states. This is the first analytical result on the behavior of dynamics for nonconsensus problems on non-complete topologies
column5: based on the first symmetry-breaking analysis in such setting.
